LightningComponentBundle.description: A select in the NSW Government Design System, populated from a field picklist

property.label: Name
property.name: name
property.description: The name of the HTML element

property.label: Is Legend
property.name: isLegend
property.description: Renders the label as a Legend

property.label: Helper
property.name: helper
property.description: Help text presented to the user

property.label: Picklist Field API Name
property.name: fieldApiName
property.description: API name of the field, e.g. CustomObj__c.CustomField__c

property.label: Record Type Id
property.name: recordTypeId
property.description: Record Type Id for the field's object

property.label: Value
property.name: value
property.description: Selected picklist values as a semi-column separated string

property.label: Required
property.name: required
property.description: Renders a visual cue that the field is mandatory and validates it
